subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Pridie had a run scored and a sacrifice fly in place of Jason Bay while Jon Niese’s career high-tying eight strikeouts helped the Mets past Milwaukee, 4-1.
snippet: Jason Pridie had a run scored and a sacrifice fly in place of Jason Bay while Jon Niese’s career high-tying eight strikeouts helped the Mets past Milwaukee, 4-1.
